headline: Fortive Schedules Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call
summary: EVERETT, Wash., July 02, 2025--Fortive Corporation ("Fortive") (NYSE: FTV) today announced that it will webcast its earnings conference call for the second quarter 2025 on Wednesday, July 30, 2025, beginning at 12:00 p.m. ET and lasting approximately 1 hour.

headline: Fortive (FTV) Tumbles on Ralliant Breakup
summary: Fortive Corporation (NYSE:FTV) is one of the 10 Stocks Crash Hard on a Roaring Monday. Fortive Corporation declined by 3.36 percent on Monday to close at $52.13 apiece following the completion of its separation with Ralliant Corp. (NYSE:RAL). In a statement, Fortive Corporation (NYSE:FTV) said it successfully concluded its separation with the Precision Technologies segment, […]

headline: S&P 500 Rallies 5% In June To Close Month At Record High
summary: The S&P 500 extended its now two-and-a-half-month rally through June to end the month at a record high.
